SEARCH
Package fr.simplon.projetlemoulin.clientcontroller

Class EventClientController

java.lang.Object
fr.simplon.projetlemoulin.clientcontroller.EventClientController
@Controller public class EventClientController extends Object
Controller class for handling client-side event-related requests. This class acts as a controller for the client-side application and handles requests related to events.

  • Method Details

    • getProgrammationPage

      @GetMapping("/programmation") public String getProgrammationPage()
      Retrieves the "programmation" page. This method handles the GET request for the "/programmation" endpoint and returns the page "programmation". It is responsible for displaying the "programmation" page.
      Returns:
      The view name for the "programmation" page.

    • getAllEventsCards

      @GetMapping("/cartesEvenements") @ResponseBody public List<Event> getAllEventsCards()
      Retrieves all events from the API endpoint. This method handles the GET request for the "/cartesEvenements" endpoint and retrieves all event from the API. It uses RestTemplate to send an HTTP GET request to the API endpoint "http://localhost:8085/rest/eventsCards". The response, containing a list of events, is then returned as the result to be displayed in card format using the "EventCard" javascript file.
      Returns:
      A list of events retrieved from the API.

    • getEventById

      @GetMapping("/evenements/{id}") public String getEventById(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves an event by its id.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to add the retrieved event.
      id - The identifier of the event to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to display for the event details.

    • displayEventsManagementList

      @GetMapping("/admin/listeEvenements") public String displayEventsManagementList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the management list of events for the admin.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to add the list of events to be displayed.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to show the administration list of events.

    • displayEventForm

      @GetMapping("/admin/creationEvenement") public String displayEventForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the event creation form.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to add the event object and the list of partners to be displayed for selection in the form.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to show the event creation form.

    • addEvent

      @PostMapping("/admin/creationEvenement") public String addEvent(@ModelAttribute("event") @Valid @Valid Event event, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a new event by processing the event creation form submission.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object to be added, obtained from the form data.
      bindingResult - The binding result object that holds the validation errors, if any.
      model - The model used to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to display a success message if the event is created, or to show the event creation form with validation errors.

    • displayUpdateEventForm

      @GetMapping("/admin/formulaireModificationEvenement/{id}") public String displayUpdateEventForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long id)
      Displays the form for updating an existing event.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to add the event object and the list of partners to be displayed for selection in the form.
      id - The identifier of the event to be updated.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to show the event modification form.

    • updateEvent

      @PutMapping("/admin/ModificationEvenement/{id}") public String updateEvent(@ModelAttribute("event") @Valid @Valid Event event, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, @PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates an existing event by processing the event modification form submission.
      Parameters:
      event - The event object with updated data obtained from the form.
      bindingResult - The binding result object that holds the validation errors, if any.
      id - The identifier of the event to be updated.
      model - The model used to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to display a success message if the event is updated, or to show the event modification form with validation errors.

    • deleteEvent

      @GetMapping("/admin/supprimerEvenement/{id}") public String deleteEvent(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes an event by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to add attributes for the view.
      id - The identifier of the event to be deleted.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to display a success message after deleting the event.
